trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Moab
There were no other sightings in Moab on or around June 30th 2002
divs: sighting detailshello.this past week, i believe it was tues november 25, i caught the tail end of a show on discovery where mufon was discussing a case w a woman named denise and trying to verify what she said. at the end there was an illustration that appeared similar to an experience i had a few years ago. at the time i called nasa to report it, but never got any response. i'm sure they either thought i was a kook or i had discovered something they wanted to remain secret about. my experience resembled the sparkly glittery that fell to the trees of this woman's property. it was the illustration at the end that triggered me to want to contact you. it was the first time i ever saw anything similar to what i experienced enough to consider speaking up about it. i don't remember the exact dates but i could likely figure it out. i think the summer of 2002. i was traveling from salt lake city to telluride for a mountain bike\climbing festival and we had left around 10 pm, arriving at moab 2 am ish. it was nice out so we were camping out under the stars at a location i used to camp at outside of canyonlands national park. its not an official camp site, and actually now has a no camping sign there, but has a direct veiw to the monitor and merimack. we'd laid down our sleeping bags and were trying to fall asleep. i was staring up into the sky and watching the stars. i saw what would have resembled in sorts what this woman denise described happened in her yard. i would describe it similar, in that it was glittery, but it was almost like a beam of glittery if that makes sense. it blended into the night sky and stars but was also very distinguishable from it. at the time, i felt like i was being "probed" laying face up and actually turned my body to the side because i was uncomfortable. i thought it bizzare as it was both vague but very real. the next morning as we were driving to breakfast i eventually commented that i had a strange experience the night before and my friend excitedly said she did too, and described pretty much the same thing. she didn't turn away from the "probing" tho like i did. she just kept watching it. it really was like a glittery beam for lack of a better way to describe it. i've always wondered about it, thought maybe it was some new secret weapon or instrument seeking data. i considered that we were in the desert and had a heat signiture that was different than anything else surrounding us, so that would likely be why there seemed to be a focus on us in particular. anyway, i thought it might be useful to speak up to support what this woman saw, and in case there is any value in it for your research. i tought it might be good to have it documented since someone else had a similar experience.thank you.
